See 'Serotonin syndrome' and 'Monoamine-oxidase inhibitor' under Antidepressant drugs in BNF for more information and for specific advice on avoiding monoamine-oxidase inhibitors during and after administration of other serotonergic drugs.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  safinamide  and  tramadol  can increase the risk of serotonin syndrome. hasDitaContent.@value: Safinamide is predicted to increase the risk of adverse effects when given with tranylcypromine. Manufacturer advises avoid and for 1 week after stopping safinamide.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Safinamide   is predicted to   increase   the risk of adverse effects when given with   tranylcypromine .  Manufacturer advises avoid and for 1 week after stopping  safinamide .

hasDitaContent.@value: Safinamide is predicted to increase the risk of severe hypertension when given with vilanterol. Manufacturer advises caution.
